00091 /* Write VTK file
00092  *
00093  * Copied from src/Mesh/MeshSet.cpp and adapted for removal of 
00094  * MeshSet class by J.Kraftcheck on 2005-7-28.
00095  *
00096  * This code is provided mainly for debugging.  A more efficient
00097  * and complete writer implementation is provided in the MeshImpl
00098  * class for saving meshes that were read from a file initially.
00099  */
00100 void write_vtk( Mesh* mesh, const char* out_filename, MsqError &err )
00101 {
00102   if (MeshImpl* msq_mesh = dynamic_cast<MeshImpl*>(mesh)) {
00103     msq_mesh->write_vtk( out_filename, err );
00104     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00105     return;
00106   }
00107 
00108     // loads a global patch
00109   PatchData pd;
00110   pd.set_mesh( mesh );
00111   pd.fill_global_patch( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00112   
00113     // write mesh
00114   write_vtk( pd, out_filename, err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 void write_vtk( PatchData& pd, const char* out_filename, MsqError &err,
00119                 const Vector3D* OF_gradient)
00120 {
00121     // Open the file
00122   std::ofstream file(out_filename);
00123   if (!file)
00124   {
00125     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00126     return;
00127   }
00128     
00129     // Write a header
00130   file << "# vtk DataFile Version 2.0\n";
00131   file << "Mesquite Mesh " << out_filename << " .\n";
00132   file << "ASCII\n";
00133   file << "DATASET UNSTRUCTURED_GRID\n";
00134   
00135     // Write vertex coordinates
00136   file << "POINTS " << pd.num_nodes() << " float\n";
00137   size_t i;
00138   for (i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); i++)
00139   {
00140     file << pd.vertex_by_index(i)[0] << ' '
00141          << pd.vertex_by_index(i)[1] << ' '
00142          << pd.vertex_by_index(i)[2] << '\n';
00143   }
00144   
00145     // Write out the connectivity table
00146   size_t connectivity_size = 0;
00147   for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i)
00148     connectivity_size += pd.element_by_index(i).node_count()+1;
00149     
00150   file << "CELLS " << pd.num_elements() << ' ' << connectivity_size << '\n';
00151   for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); i++)
00152   {
00153     std::vector<size_t> vtx_indices;
00154     pd.element_by_index(i).get_node_indices(vtx_indices);
00155     
00156       // Convert native to VTK node order, if not the same
00157     const VtkTypeInfo* info = VtkTypeInfo::find_type( pd.element_by_index(i).get_element_type(),
00158                                                       vtx_indices.size(),
00159                                                       err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00160     info->mesquiteToVtkOrder( vtx_indices );
00161      
00162     file << vtx_indices.size();
00163     for (std::size_t j = 0; j < vtx_indices.size(); ++j)
00164     {
00165       file << ' ' << vtx_indices[j];
00166     }
00167     file << '\n';
00168   }
00169   
00170     // Write out the element types
00171   file << "CELL_TYPES " << pd.num_elements() << '\n';
00172   for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); i++)
00173   {
00174     const VtkTypeInfo* info = VtkTypeInfo::find_type( 
00175                                pd.element_by_index(i).get_element_type(),
00176                                pd.element_by_index(i).node_count(),
00177                                err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00178     file << info->vtkType << '\n';
00179   }
00180   
00181     // Write out which points are fixed.
00182   file << "POINT_DATA " << pd.num_nodes()
00183        << "\nSCALARS fixed int\nLOOKUP_TABLE default\n";
00184   for (i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i)
00185   {
00186     if (pd.vertex_by_index(i).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_CULLED)
00187       file << "1\n";
00188     else
00189       file << "0\n";
00190   }
00191   file << "SCALARS culled short\nLOOKUP_TABLE default\n";
00192   for (i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i)
00193   {
00194     if (pd.vertex_by_index(i).is_free_vertex())
00195       file << "0\n";
00196     else
00197       file << "1\n";
00198   }
00199   
00200   
00201   if (OF_gradient) {
00202     file << "VECTORS gradient double\n";
00203     for (i = 0; i < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++i) 
00204       file << OF_gradient[i].x() << " " << OF_gradient[i].y() << " " << OF_gradient[i].z() << "\n";
00205     for (i = pd.num_free_vertices(); i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i)
00206       file << "0.0 0.0 0.0\n";
00207   }
00208   
00209   
00210   
00211     // Close the file
00212   file.close();
00213 }

00219   PatchData pd;
00220   pd.set_mesh( mesh );

00225 void write_gnuplot( Mesh* mesh, std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elems,
00226                     const char* out_filebase, MsqError &err)
00227 {
00228     // loads a global patch
00229   PatchData pd;
00230   pd.set_mesh( mesh );
00231   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts;
00232   pd.set_mesh_entities( elems, verts, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);

00237 /*  Writes a gnuplot file directly from the MeshSet.
00238  *  This means that any mesh imported successfully into Mesquite
00239  *  can be outputed in gnuplot format.
00240  *
00241  *  Within gnuplot, use \b plot 'file1.gpt' w l, 'file2.gpt' w l  
00242  *   
00243  *  This is not geared for performance, since it has to load a global Patch from
00244  *  the mesh to write a mesh file. 
00245  *
00246  * Copied from src/Mesh/MeshSet.cpp and adapted for removal of 
00247  * MeshSet class by J.Kraftcheck on 2005-7-28.
00248  * 
00249  * Re-written to use EdgeIterator by J.Kraftcheck on 2009-6-11
00250 */
00251 void write_gnuplot( PatchData& pd, const char* out_filebase, MsqError& err )
00252 {
00253     // Open the file
00254   std::string out_filename = out_filebase;
00255   out_filename += ".gpt";
00256   std::ofstream file(out_filename.c_str());
00257   if (!file)
00258   {
00259     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00260     return;
00261   }
00262 
00263   EdgeIterator edges( &pd, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00264    
00265     // Write a header
00266   file << "\n";
00267   
00268   while (!edges.is_at_end())
00269   {
00270     const Vector3D& s = edges.start();
00271     const Vector3D& e = edges.end();
00272     const Vector3D* m = edges.mid();
00273     
00274     file << s[0] << ' ' << s[1] << ' ' << s[2] << std::endl;
00275     if (m) 
00276       file << (*m)[0] << ' ' << (*m)[1] << ' ' << (*m)[2] << std::endl;
00277     file << e[0] << ' ' << e[1] << ' ' << e[2] << std::endl;
00278     file << std::endl << std::endl;
00279     
00280     edges.step(err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00281   }
00282   
00283     // Close the file
00284   file.close();
00285 }
00286 
00292 static void find_gnuplot_agregate_range( int count,
00293                                          const char* basename,
00294                                          Vector3D& min,
00295                                          Vector3D& max,
00296                                          MsqError& err )
00297 {
00298     // read all input files to determine extents
00299   min = Vector3D( HUGE_VAL, HUGE_VAL, HUGE_VAL);
00300   max = Vector3D(-HUGE_VAL,-HUGE_VAL,-HUGE_VAL);
00301   for (int i = 0; i <= count; ++i) {
00302     stringstream s;
00303     s << basename << '.' << i << ".gpt";
00304     ifstream infile( s.str().c_str() );
00305     if (!infile) {
00306       MSQ_SETERR(err)(s.str(), MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00307       return;
00308     }
00309     double c[3];
00310     while (infile >> c[0] >> c[1] >> c[2]) {
00311       for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
00312         if (c[j] < min[j])
00313           min[j] = c[j];
00314         if (c[j] > max[j])
00315           max[j] = c[j];
00316       }
00317     }
00318   }
00319 }
00320   
00324 void write_gnuplot_animator( int count, const char* basename, MsqError& err )
00325 {
00326   if (count <= 0)
00327     return;
00328 
00329   const int DELAY = 10;
00330   const int WIDTH = 640;
00331   const int HEIGHT = 480;
00332   
00333     // read all input files to determine extents
00334   Vector3D min, max;
00335   find_gnuplot_agregate_range( count, basename, min, max, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00336 
00337     // chose coordinate plane to plot in
00338   Vector3D range = max - min;
00339   int haxis = 0, vaxis = 1;
00340   if (range[0] < range[1] && range[1] < range[2]) {
00341     haxis = 1;
00342     vaxis = 2;
00343   }
00344   else if (range[1] < range[2]) {
00345     vaxis = 2;
00346   }
00347   
00348     // open output file
00349   string base(basename);
00350   ofstream file( (string(basename) + ".gnuplot").c_str() );
00351   if (!file)
00352   {
00353     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00354     return;
00355   }
00356   
00357     // write header
00358   file << "#!gnuplot" << endl;
00359   file << "#" << endl;
00360   file << "# Mesquite Animation of " << basename << ".0 to " << basename << '.' << count << endl;
00361   file << "#" << endl;
00362   
00363     // write plot settings
00364   file << "set term gif animate transparent opt delay " << DELAY << " size " << WIDTH << "," << HEIGHT << endl;
00365   file << "set xrange [" << min[haxis] - 0.05 * range[haxis] << ":" << max[haxis] + 0.05 * range[haxis] << "]" << endl;
00366   file << "set yrange [" << min[vaxis] - 0.05 * range[vaxis] << ":" << max[vaxis] + 0.05 * range[vaxis] << "]" << endl;
00367   file << "set title '" << basename << "'" << endl;
00368   file << "set output '" << basename << ".gif'" << endl;
00369   
00370     // plot data
00371   for (int i = 0; i <= count; ++i) 
00372     file << "plot '" << basename << '.' << i << ".gpt'" 
00373          << " using " << haxis+1 << ":" << vaxis+1 << " w l" << endl;
00374 }

00377 
00378 static unsigned red( int i, int c )
00379 {
00380   if (i * 4 <= c)
00381     return 255;
00382   else if (i * 4 >= 3 * c)
00383     return 0;
00384   else
00385     return 384 - i * 511 / c;
00386 }
00387 
00388 static unsigned green( int i, int c )
00389 {
00390   if (i * 4 < c)
00391     return i * 510 / c;
00392   else if (i * 4 > 3 * c)
00393     return 1023 - i * 1023 / c;
00394   else
00395     return 255;
00396 }
00397 
00398 static unsigned blue( int i, int c )
00399 {
00400   if (i * 4 <= c)
00401     return 0;
00402   else if (i * 4 >= 3 * c)
00403     return 255;
00404   else
00405     return i * 511 / c - 127;
00406 }
00407 
00411 void write_gnuplot_overlay( int count, const char* basename, MsqError& err )
00412 {
00413   if (count <= 0)
00414     return;
00415 
00416   const int WIDTH = 640;
00417   const int HEIGHT = 480;
00418   
00419     // read all input files to determine extents
00420   Vector3D min, max;
00421   find_gnuplot_agregate_range( count, basename, min, max, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00422 
00423     // chose coordinate plane to plot in
00424   Vector3D range = max - min;
00425   int haxis = 0, vaxis = 1;
00426   if (range[0] < range[1] && range[1] < range[2]) {
00427     haxis = 1;
00428     vaxis = 2;
00429   }
00430   else if (range[1] < range[2]) {
00431     vaxis = 2;
00432   }
00433   
00434     // open output file
00435   string base(basename);
00436   FILE* file = fopen( (string(basename) + ".gnuplot").c_str(), "w" );
00437   if (!file)
00438   {
00439     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00440     return;
00441   }
00442   
00443     // write header
00444   fprintf( file, "#!gnuplot\n" );
00445   fprintf( file, "#\n" );
00446   fprintf( file, "# Mesquite Overlay of %s.0 to %s.%d\n", basename, basename, count );
00447   fprintf( file, "#\n" );
00448   
00449     // write plot settings
00450   fprintf( file, "set term gif size %d,%d\n", WIDTH, HEIGHT );
00451   fprintf( file, "set xrange [%f:%f]\n", min[haxis] - 0.05 * range[haxis], max[haxis] + 0.05 * range[haxis] );
00452   fprintf( file, "set yrange [%f:%f]\n", min[vaxis] - 0.05 * range[vaxis], max[vaxis] + 0.05 * range[vaxis] );
00453   fprintf( file, "set title '%s'\n", basename );
00454   fprintf( file, "set output '%s.gif'\n", basename );
00455   
00456     // plot data
00457   fprintf( file, "plot '%s.0.gpt' using %d:%d w l lc rgb '#%02x%02x%02x' title 't0'",
00458            basename, haxis+1, vaxis+1, red(0,count), green(0,count), blue(0,count) );
00459   for (int i = 1; i <= count; ++i) {
00460     fprintf( file, ", \\\n     '%s.%d.gpt' using %d:%d w l lc rgb '#%02x%02x%02x' title 't%d'",
00461              basename, i, haxis+1, vaxis+1, red(i,count), green(i,count), blue(i,count), i);
00462   }
00463   fprintf( file, "\n" );
00464   
00465   fclose(file);
00466 }

00468 
00469 void write_stl( Mesh* mesh, const char* filename, MsqError& err )
00470 {
00471     // Open the file
00472   ofstream file(filename);
00473   if (!file)
00474   {
00475     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00476     return;
00477   }
00478   
00479     // Write header
00480   char header[70];
00481   sprintf( header, "Mesquite%d", rand() );
00482   file << "solid " << header << endl;
00483   
00484   MsqVertex coords[3];
00485   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts(3);
00486   std::vector<size_t> offsets(2);
00487   
00488     // Iterate over all elements
00489   size_t count = 0;
00490   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elems;
00491   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>::iterator iter;
00492   mesh->get_all_elements( elems, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00493   for (iter = elems.begin(); iter != elems.end(); ++iter)
00494   {
00495       // Skip non-triangles
00496     Mesh::ElementHandle elem = *iter;
00497     EntityTopology type;
00498     mesh->elements_get_topologies( &elem, &type, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00499     if (type != TRIANGLE) 
00500       continue;
00501     ++count;
00502     
00503       // Get vertex coordinates
00504     mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &elem, 1, verts, offsets, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00505     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( arrptr(verts), coords, 3, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00506     
00507       // Get triagnle normal
00508     Vector3D n = (coords[0] - coords[1]) * (coords[0] - coords[2]);
00509     n.normalize();
00510     
00511       // Write triangle
00512     file << "facet normal " << n.x() << " " << n.y() << " " << n.z() << endl;
00513     file << "outer loop" << endl;
00514     for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00515       file << "vertex " << coords[i].x() << " " 
00516                         << coords[i].y() << " " 
00517                         << coords[i].z() << endl;
00518     file << "endloop" << endl;
00519     file << "endfacet" << endl;
00520   }
00521   
00522   file << "endsolid " << header << endl;
00523   
00524   file.close();
00525   if (count == 0)
00526   {
00527     std::remove(filename);
00528     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Mesh contains no triangles", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00529   }
00530 }

00534 Projection::Projection( PlanarDomain* domain )
00535 {
00536   Vector3D normal;
00537   domain->vertex_normal_at( 0, normal );
00538   init( normal );
00539 }
00540 
00541 Projection::Projection( const Vector3D& n )
00542 { init( n ); }
00543 
00544 Projection::Projection( const Vector3D& n, const Vector3D& up )
00545 { init( n, up ); }
00546 
00547 Projection::Projection( Axis h, Axis v )
00548 {
00549   Vector3D horiz(0,0,0), vert(0,0,0);
00550   horiz[h] = 1.0;
00551   vert[v] = 1.0;
00552   init( horiz * vert, vert );
00553 }
00554 
00555 void Projection::init( const Vector3D& n )
00556 {
00557     // Choose an "up" direction
00558 
00559   Axis max = X;
00560   for (Axis i = Y; i <= Z; i = (Axis)(i+1))
00561     if (fabs(n[i]) > fabs(n[max]))
00562       max = i;
00563   
00564   Axis up;
00565   if (max == Y)
00566     up = Z;
00567   else 
00568     up = Y;
00569   
00570     // Initialize rotation matrix
00571   
00572   Vector3D up_vect(0,0,0);
00573   up_vect[up] = 1.0;
00574   init( n, up_vect );
00575 }  
00576 
00577 void Projection::init(  const Vector3D& n1, const Vector3D& up1 )
00578 {
00579   MsqError err;
00580   const Vector3D n = n1/n1.length();
00581   const Vector3D u = up1/up1.length();
00582   
00583   // Rotate for projection
00584   const Vector3D z( 0., 0., 1. );
00585   Vector3D r = n * z;
00586   double angle = r.interior_angle( n, z, err );
00587   Matrix3D rot1 = rotation( r, angle );
00588    
00589   // In-plane rotation for up vector
00590   Vector3D pu = u - n * (n % u);
00591   Vector3D y( 0., 1., 0. );
00592   angle = z.interior_angle( pu, y, err );
00593   Matrix3D rot2 = rotation( z, angle );
00594   
00595   this->myTransform = rot1 * rot2;
00596 }
00597 
00598 Matrix3D Projection::rotation( const Vector3D& axis, double angle )
00599 {
00600   const double c = cos( angle );
00601   const double s = sin( angle );
00602   const double x = axis.x();
00603   const double y = axis.y();
00604   const double z = axis.z(); 
00605   
00606   const double xform[9] = 
00607     {    c + x*x*(1-c),  -z*s + x*y*(1-c),  y*s + x*z*(1-c),
00608        z*s + x*y*(1-c),     c + y*y*(1-c), -x*s + y*z*(1-c),
00609       -y*s + x*z*(1-c),   x*s + y*z*(1-c),    c + z*z*(1-c) };
00610   return Matrix3D( xform );
00611 }
00612 
00613 void Projection::project( const Vector3D& p, float& h, float& v )
00614 {
00615   Vector3D pr = myTransform * p;
00616   h = (float)pr.x();
00617   v = (float)pr.y();
00618 }
00619 
00620 Transform2D::Transform2D( PatchData* pd,
00621                           Projection& projection,
00622                           unsigned width, 
00623                           unsigned height,
00624                           bool flip )
00625   : myProj(projection),
00626     vertSign(flip ? -1 : 1)
00627 {
00628     // Get the bounding box of the projected points
00629   float w_max, w_min, h_max, h_min;
00630   w_max = h_max = -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
00631   w_min = h_min =  std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
00632   MsqError err;
00633   const MsqVertex* verts = pd->get_vertex_array( err );
00634   const size_t num_vert = pd->num_nodes();
00635   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_vert; ++i)
00636   {
00637     float w, h;
00638     myProj.project( verts[i], w, h );
00639     if (w > w_max) w_max = w;
00640     if (w < w_min) w_min = w;
00641     if (h > h_max) h_max = h;
00642     if (h < h_min) h_min = h;
00643   }
00644   
00645     // Determine the scale factor
00646   const float w_scale = (float)width  / (w_max - w_min);
00647   const float h_scale = (float)height / (h_max - h_min);
00648   myScale = w_scale > h_scale ? h_scale : w_scale;
00649   
00650     // Determine offset
00651   horizOffset = -(int)(myScale * w_min);
00652   vertOffset  = -(int)(myScale * (flip ? -h_max : h_min));
00653   
00654     // Determine bounding box
00655   horizMax = (int)(                 w_max  * myScale) + horizOffset;
00656   vertMax  = (int)((flip ? -h_min : h_max) * myScale) +  vertOffset; 
00657     
00658 }
00659  
00660 Transform2D::Transform2D( const Vector3D* verts,
00661                           size_t num_vert,
00662                           Projection& projection,
00663                           unsigned width, 
00664                           unsigned height )
00665   : myProj(projection),
00666     vertSign(1)
00667 {
00668     // Get the bounding box of the projected points
00669   float w_max, w_min, h_max, h_min;
00670   w_max = h_max = -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
00671   w_min = h_min =  std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
00672   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_vert; ++i)
00673   {
00674     float w, h;
00675     myProj.project( verts[i], w, h );
00676     if (w > w_max) w_max = w;
00677     if (w < w_min) w_min = w;
00678     if (h > h_max) h_max = h;
00679     if (h < h_min) h_min = h;
00680   }
00681   
00682     // Determine the scale factor
00683   const float w_scale = (float)width  / (w_max - w_min);
00684   const float h_scale = (float)height / (h_max - h_min);
00685   myScale = w_scale > h_scale ? h_scale : w_scale;
00686   
00687     // Determine offset
00688   horizOffset = -(int)(myScale * w_min);
00689   vertOffset  = -(int)(myScale * h_min);
00690   
00691     // Determine bounding box
00692   horizMax = (int)(w_max * myScale) + horizOffset;
00693   vertMax  = (int)(h_max * myScale) +  vertOffset; 
00694     
00695 }
00696    
00697 void Transform2D::transform( const Vector3D& coords,
00698                              int& horizontal,
00699                              int& vertical ) const
00700 {
00701     float horiz, vert;
00702     myProj.project( coords, horiz, vert );
00703     horizontal =            (int)(myScale * horiz) + horizOffset;
00704     vertical   = vertSign * (int)(myScale *  vert) +  vertOffset;
00705 }
00706 
00719 static void write_eps_quadratic_edge( ostream &s,
00720                                       Transform2D& xform,
00721                                       Vector3D start,
00722                                       Vector3D mid, 
00723                                       Vector3D end )
00724 {
00725   Vector3D P1 = 1./3 * (4 * mid - end);
00726   Vector3D P2 = 1./3 * (4 * mid - start);
00727 
00728   int x, y;
00729   xform.transform( start, x, y );
00730   s << x << ' ' << y << " moveto" << endl;
00731   xform.transform( P1, x, y );
00732   s << x << ' ' << y << ' ';
00733   xform.transform( P2, x, y );
00734   s << x << ' ' << y << ' ';
00735   xform.transform( end, x, y );
00736   s << x << ' ' << y << " curveto" << endl;
00737 }
00738 
00739 void write_eps( Mesh* mesh, 
00740                 const char* filename, 
00741                 Projection proj, 
00742                 MsqError& err,
00743                 int width, int height )
00744 {
00745     // Get a global patch
00746   PatchData pd;
00747   pd.set_mesh( mesh );
00748   pd.fill_global_patch( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00749   
00750   Transform2D transf( &pd, proj, width, height, false );
00751     
00752     // Open the file
00753   ofstream s(filename);
00754   if (!s)
00755   {
00756     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00757     return;
00758   }
00759 
00760     // Write header
00761   s << "%!PS-Adobe-2.0 EPSF-2.0"                      << endl;
00762   s << "%%Creator: Mesquite"                          << endl;
00763   s << "%%Title: Mesquite "                           << endl;
00764   s << "%%DocumentData: Clean7Bit"                    << endl;
00765   s << "%%Origin: 0 0"                                << endl;
00766   s << "%%BoundingBox: 0 0 " 
00767     << transf.max_horizontal() <<  ' ' 
00768     << transf.max_vertical()                          << endl;
00769   s << "%%Pages: 1"                                   << endl;
00770   
00771   s << "%%BeginProlog"                                << endl;
00772   s << "save"                                         << endl;
00773   s << "countdictstack"                               << endl;
00774   s << "mark"                                         << endl;
00775   s << "newpath"                                      << endl;
00776   s << "/showpage {} def"                             << endl;
00777   s << "/setpagedevice {pop} def"                     << endl;
00778   s << "%%EndProlog"                                  << endl;
00779   
00780   s << "%%Page: 1 1"                                  << endl;
00781   s << "1 setlinewidth"                               << endl;
00782   s << "0.0 setgray"                                  << endl;
00783   
00784     // Write mesh edges
00785   EdgeIterator iter( &pd, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00786   while( !iter.is_at_end() )
00787   {
00788     int s_w, s_h, e_w, e_h;
00789     transf.transform( iter.start(), s_w, s_h );
00790     transf.transform( iter.end  (), e_w, e_h );
00791     
00792     s << "newpath"                                    << endl;
00793     s << s_w << ' ' << s_h << " moveto"               << endl;
00794     
00795     if (!iter.mid()) {
00796       s << e_w << ' ' << e_h << " lineto"               << endl;
00797     }
00798     else {
00799       write_eps_quadratic_edge( s, transf, iter.start(), *iter.mid(), iter.end() );
00800         // draw rings at mid-edge node location
00801       //transf.transform( *(iter.mid()), w1, h1 );
00802       //s << w1+2 << ' ' << h1 <<  " moveto"            << endl;
00803       //s << w1 << ' ' << h1 <<  " 2 0 360 arc"         << endl;
00804     }
00805     s << "stroke"                                       << endl;
00806     
00807     iter.step(err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00808   }
00809   
00810     // Write footer
00811   s << "%%Trailer"                                    << endl;
00812   s << "cleartomark"                                  << endl;
00813   s << "countdictstack"                               << endl;
00814   s << "exch sub { end } repeat"                      << endl;
00815   s << "restore"                                      << endl;  
00816   s << "%%EOF"                                        << endl;
00817 }
00818 
00820 static double tN0( double r, double s ) { double t = 1 - r - s; return t*(2*t - 1); }
00821 static double tN1( double r, double   ) { return r*(2*r - 1); }
00822 static double tN2( double  , double s ) { return s*(2*s - 1); }
00823 static double tN3( double r, double s ) { double t = 1 - r - s; return 4*r*t; }
00824 static double tN4( double r, double s ) { return 4*r*s; }
00825 static double tN5( double r, double s ) { double t = 1 - r - s; return 4*s*t; }
00827 static Vector3D quad_tri_pt( double r, double s, const Vector3D* coords )
00828 {
00829   Vector3D result = tN0(r,s) * coords[0];
00830   result += tN1(r,s) * coords[1];
00831   result += tN2(r,s) * coords[2];
00832   result += tN3(r,s) * coords[3];
00833   result += tN4(r,s) * coords[4];
00834   result += tN5(r,s) * coords[5];
00835   return result;
00836 }
00837 
00838 void write_eps_triangle( Mesh* mesh, 
00839                          Mesh::ElementHandle elem,
00840                          const char* filename, 
00841                          bool draw_iso_lines, 
00842                          bool draw_nodes,
00843                          MsqError& err,
00844                          int width, int height )
00845 {
00846     // Get triangle vertices
00847   MsqVertex coords[6];
00848   EntityTopology type;
00849   mesh->elements_get_topologies( &elem, &type, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00850   if (type != TRIANGLE) {
00851     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00852     return;
00853   }
00854   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts;
00855   std::vector<size_t> junk;
00856   mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &elem, 1, verts, junk, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00857   if (verts.size() != 3 && verts.size() != 6) {
00858     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00859     return;
00860   }
00861   mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( arrptr(verts), coords, verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00862   
00863   Vector3D coords2[6];
00864   std::copy( coords, coords+verts.size(), coords2 );
00865   
00866   std::vector<bool> fixed(verts.size(), false);
00867   if (draw_nodes) {
00868     mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( arrptr(verts), fixed, verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00869   }
00870   write_eps_triangle( coords2, verts.size(), filename, draw_iso_lines, draw_nodes, err, fixed, width, height );
00871 }
00872 
00873 void write_eps_triangle( const Vector3D* coords,
00874                          size_t num_vtx,
00875                          const char* filename, 
00876                          bool draw_iso_lines, 
00877                          bool draw_nodes,
00878                          MsqError& err,
00879                          const std::vector<bool>& fixed,
00880                          int width, int height )
00881 {
00882   const int PT_RAD = 3; // radius of circles for drawing nodes, in points
00883   const int PAD = PT_RAD + 2; // margin in points
00884   const double EDGE_GRAY  = 0.0; // color for triangle edges, 0.0 => black
00885   const double ISO_GRAY   = 0.7; // color for parameter iso-lines
00886   const double NODE_GRAY  = 0.0; // color for node circle 
00887   const double FIXED_GRAY = 1.0; // color to fill fixed nodes with, 1.0 => white
00888   const double FREE_GRAY  = 0.0; // color to fill free nodes with
00889 
00890   Projection proj( X, Y );
00891   Transform2D transf( coords, num_vtx, proj, width, height );
00892     
00893     // Open the file
00894   ofstream str(filename);
00895   if (!str)
00896   {
00897     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
00898     return;
00899   }
00900 
00901     // Write header
00902   str << "%!PS-Adobe-2.0 EPSF-2.0"                      << endl;
00903   str << "%%Creator: Mesquite"                          << endl;
00904   str << "%%Title: Mesquite "                           << endl;
00905   str << "%%DocumentData: Clean7Bit"                    << endl;
00906   str << "%%Origin: 0 0"                                << endl;
00907   str << "%%BoundingBox: " << -PAD << ' ' << -PAD << ' ' 
00908       << transf.max_horizontal() + PAD <<  ' ' 
00909       << transf.max_vertical()   + PAD                  << endl;
00910   str << "%%Pages: 1"                                   << endl;
00911   
00912   str << "%%BeginProlog"                                << endl;
00913   str << "save"                                         << endl;
00914   str << "countdictstack"                               << endl;
00915   str << "mark"                                         << endl;
00916   str << "newpath"                                      << endl;
00917   str << "/showpage {} def"                             << endl;
00918   str << "/setpagedevice {pop} def"                     << endl;
00919   str << "%%EndProlog"                                  << endl;
00920   
00921   str << "%%Page: 1 1"                                  << endl;
00922   str << "1 setlinewidth"                               << endl;
00923   str << EDGE_GRAY << " setgray"                        << endl;
00924 
00925   const double h = 0.5, t = 1.0/3.0, w = 2.0/3.0, s = 1./6, f = 5./6;
00926   const int NUM_ISO = 15;
00927   const double iso_params[NUM_ISO][2][2] = 
00928     { { { h, 0 }, { h, h } },  // r = 1/2
00929       { { t, 0 }, { t, w } },  // r = 1/3
00930       { { w, 0 }, { w, t } },  // r = 2/3
00931       { { s, 0 }, { s, f } },  // r = 1/6
00932       { { f, 0 }, { f, s } },  // r = 5/6
00933       { { 0, h }, { h, h } },  // s = 1/2
00934       { { 0, t }, { w, t } },  // s = 1/3
00935       { { 0, w }, { t, w } },  // s = 2/3
00936       { { 0, s }, { f, s } },  // s = 1/6
00937       { { 0, f }, { s, f } },  // s = 5/6
00938       { { 0, h }, { h ,0 } },  // t = 1 - r - s = 1/2
00939       { { 0, w }, { w, 0 } },  // t = 1 - r - s = 1/3
00940       { { 0, t }, { t, 0 } },  // t = 1 - r - s = 2/3
00941       { { 0, f }, { f, 0 } },  // t = 1 - r - s = 1/6
00942       { { 0, s }, { s, 0 } }   // t = 1 - r - s = 5/6
00943      };
00944 
00945   if (num_vtx == 3) {
00946     int x[3], y[3];
00947     for (size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i) 
00948       transf.transform( coords[i], x[i], y[i] );
00949     
00950     str << "newpath"                                      << endl;
00951     str << x[0] << ' ' << y[0] << " moveto"               << endl;
00952     str << x[1] << ' ' << y[1] << " lineto"               << endl;
00953     str << x[2] << ' ' << y[2] << " lineto"               << endl;
00954     str << x[0] << ' ' << y[0] << " lineto"               << endl;
00955     str << "stroke"                                       << endl;
00956     
00957     if (draw_iso_lines) {
00958       str << ISO_GRAY << " setgray"                       << endl;
00959       str << "newpath"                                    << endl;
00960       for (int i = 0; i < NUM_ISO; ++i) {
00961         double R[2] = { iso_params[i][0][0], iso_params[i][1][0] };
00962         double S[2] = { iso_params[i][0][1], iso_params[i][1][1] };
00963         double T[2] = { 1 - R[0] - S[0], 1 - R[1] - S[1] };
00964         Vector3D p[2] = { T[0] * coords[0] + R[0] * coords[1] + S[0] * coords[2],
00965                           T[1] * coords[0] + R[1] * coords[1] + S[1] * coords[2] };
00966         transf.transform( p[0], x[0], y[0] );
00967         transf.transform( p[1], x[1], y[1] );
00968         str << x[0] << ' ' << y[0] << " moveto"           << endl;
00969         str << x[1] << ' ' << y[1] << " lineto"           << endl;
00970         
00971       }
00972       str << "    stroke"                                 << endl;
00973     }
00974   }
00975   else if (num_vtx == 6) {
00976     str << "newpath"                                      << endl;
00977     write_eps_quadratic_edge( str, transf, coords[0], coords[3], coords[1] );
00978     write_eps_quadratic_edge( str, transf, coords[1], coords[4], coords[2] );
00979     write_eps_quadratic_edge( str, transf, coords[2], coords[5], coords[0] );
00980     str << "stroke"                                       << endl;
00981     
00982     if (draw_iso_lines) {
00983       str << ISO_GRAY << " setgray"                       << endl;
00984       str << "newpath"                                    << endl;
00985       for (int i = 0; i < NUM_ISO; ++i) {
00986         double R[3] = { iso_params[i][0][0], 0, iso_params[i][1][0] };
00987         double S[3] = { iso_params[i][0][1], 0, iso_params[i][1][1] };
00988         R[1] = 0.5*(R[0]+R[2]);
00989         S[1] = 0.5*(S[0]+S[2]);
00990         Vector3D p[3] = { quad_tri_pt( R[0], S[0], coords ),
00991                           quad_tri_pt( R[1], S[1], coords ),
00992                           quad_tri_pt( R[2], S[2], coords ) };
00993         write_eps_quadratic_edge( str, transf, p[0], p[1], p[2] );
00994       }
00995       str << "    stroke"                                 << endl;
00996     }
00997   }
00998   
00999   if (draw_nodes) {
01000     for (size_t i = 0; i < num_vtx; ++i) {
01001       int w, h;
01002         // fill interior with either white or black depending
01003         // on whether or not the vertex is fixed.
01004       if (fixed[i]) 
01005         str << FIXED_GRAY << " setgray"                     << endl;
01006       else
01007         str << FREE_GRAY << " setgray"                      << endl;
01008       transf.transform( coords[i], w, h );
01009       str << w+PT_RAD << ' ' << h << " moveto"              << endl;
01010       str << w << ' ' << h << ' ' << PT_RAD << " 0 360 arc" << endl;
01011       str << "closepath fill"                               << endl;
01012       str << NODE_GRAY << " setgray"                        << endl;
01013       str << "newpath"                                      << endl;
01014       str << w << ' ' << h << ' ' << PT_RAD << " 0 360 arc" << endl;
01015       str << "stroke"                                       << endl;
01016     }
01017   }
01018   
01019     // Write footer
01020   str << "%%Trailer"                                    << endl;
01021   str << "cleartomark"                                  << endl;
01022   str << "countdictstack"                               << endl;
01023   str << "exch sub { end } repeat"                      << endl;
01024   str << "restore"                                      << endl;  
01025   str << "%%EOF"                                        << endl;
01026 }
01027 
01028 void write_svg( Mesh* mesh, 
01029                 const char* filename, 
01030                 Projection proj, 
01031                 MsqError& err )
01032 {
01033     // Get a global patch
01034   PatchData pd;
01035   pd.set_mesh( mesh );
01036   pd.fill_global_patch( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01037   
01038   Transform2D transf( &pd, proj, 400, 400, true );
01039     
01040     // Open the file
01041   ofstream file(filename);
01042   if (!file)
01043   {
01044     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
01045     return;
01046   }
01047 
01048     // Write header
01049   file << "<?xml version=\"1.0\" standalone=\"no\"?>"                << endl;
01050   file << "<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN\" " 
01051        << "\"http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd\">"    << endl;
01052   file <<                                                               endl;
01053   file << "<svg width=\"" << transf.max_horizontal() 
01054        << "\" height=\"" << transf.max_vertical()
01055        << "\" version=\"1.1\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\">" << endl;
01056   
01057     // Write mesh edges
01058   EdgeIterator iter( &pd, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01059   while( !iter.is_at_end() )
01060   {
01061     int s_w, s_h, e_w, e_h;
01062     transf.transform( iter.start(), s_w, s_h );
01063     transf.transform( iter.end  (), e_w, e_h );
01064     
01065     file << "<line "
01066          << "x1=\"" << s_w << "\" "
01067          << "y1=\"" << s_h << "\" "
01068          << "x2=\"" << e_w << "\" "
01069          << "y2=\"" << e_h << "\" "
01070          << " style=\"stroke:rgb(99,99,99);stroke-width:2\""
01071          << "/>" << endl;
01072     
01073     iter.step( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01074   }
01075   
01076     // Write footer
01077   file << "</svg>" << endl;
01078 }
